home_first_info1: Cannabis seeds are our theme! Over the years, distributing seeds on a large scale, the Pro100Seeds team has accumulated vast experience in sourcing and delivering only the best seeds on the market. It's time to enter the retail market and delight not only wholesale buyers, but also our smaller retail customers. The emotions that you will experience in the process of growing will not be forgotten for a long time and you will be proud to tell your partners: “Genetics from Pro100Seeds”
home_first_info2:
Pro100seeds offers one of the most complete catalogs of marijuana strains: a wide variety of high quality regulars, a wide range of feminized seeds and a rich offer of autos.
Here you can find the best pure sativas on the market as well as a wide variety of foreign varieties (sativa and indica), innovative marijuana hybrids (pure sativa hybrids, sativa dominant varieties, sativa / indica varieties and indica dominant strains), developed as a result works on conservation and selection of foreign producers.
